Если вас достали настолько, что вы хотите кого-нибудь растерзать, то добро пожаловать в симулятор маньяка!
Вы сможете примерить на себя роль самых известных монстров / злодеев, охотиться на людей и вешать их на крюки! Только придется довольно долго ждать жертв, поскольку большинство юзеров не хотят играть за выживающих.

Традиционные минусы: читерье и постоянное выдаивание бабла платными DLC.

Me parece un juego muy entretenido y que necesita estrategia, toma su tiempo entender a los diferentes asesinos y las habilidades de los sobrevivientes. Me gustaría poder tener una mayor comunicación entre sobrevivientes, aunque sea por medio de chat o voz. Para que tenga realismos, sería bueno que solo pudieramos comnicarnos a cierto rango de distancia.

Edit: They've come a long way towards fixing the UI, bugs and overall quality of the game.  Crossplay console players tend to drop fairly often but for the most part your gameplay experience will be enjoyable most of the time now.  Matchmaking works better since with crossplay there is a larger pool of players to choose from so no more rank 20's in a game with rank 5+

Let me start by saying Dead By Daylight is lots of fun when you can actually play a game.  Unfortunately even if you can get in to a game there is no guarantee you can actually finish it.

Crash to desktop
Crash to server
Tons of bugs

I gave it time because I figured these would be one off issues but about 1 out of every 5 games I will crash mid match which also means no in game points, consumables lost and not only does it ruin my experience but it ruins the experiences of the others playing.

I'd rather solo queue in Dota and have the other 9 players flame me because then at least I'd be able to finish a game.

Eu acho o conceito do jogo muito legal mas creio que alguns fatores deveriam ser melhorados. Alguns monstros de DLC são extremamente fortes e apelões comparando aos outros, e a maioria dos players quando jogam de monstro ficam trollando e esperando o sobrevivente morrer no gancho... Gostaria muito que viesse uma forma de denunciar esses jogadores e que realmente sejam punidos, e que fosse nerfado a habilidade de alguns monstros de determinadas DLCs. Na minha opinião, o que falta em Dead by Daylight é um chat de voz.

This is a very well maintained game that has many amazing moments.  If you want excitement and stealth/run gameplay this is the game for you.
Fun game once you learn how to play.  There is a bit of a learning curve.
The game is far from perfect, but until someone creates a better asymmetrical game this is the only halfway decent option.

Un buen juego con una comunidad sana, tipo si juegas una muy buena partida de killer los survis te diran lo bien que juegas ese killer e incluso te llenaran el perfil de comentarios positivos, todos son muy buenas personas, no existe toxicidad en este juego. SI estas jugando una mala partida de survi tus compañeros no te insultaran diciendote malo culiao, al contrario, te agregaran de amigos en steam para darte consejos de como loopear. Una vez cuando estaba aprendiendo a jugar de killer los survis me hacian click click ayudandome a que no me pierda en la persecucion, es un juego bastante balanceado donde rara vez encontraran bugs, conoci este juego viendo stream por twitch donde conoci a tremendos jugadores y creadores de contenidos, mi referente son Lup4ntv y Megamaan, jugadores super tranquilos que nunca dicen nada incoherente ni se quejan de estupideces, dificil que se les escape un survi jugando de killer, algun dia quiero ser como ellos. Alto juego compralo y te divertiras

I love the game. Absolutely love the game, its got its bugs and quirks (and a strange matchmaking system), but the game is great. The playerbase on the other hand, that can sometimes suck. As with any game there are trolls, there are hackers, and there are people too salty to even respond to, and there are those who are just genuinely bad at the game, and that need to be cut some slack for just simply enjoying the game despite being bad. I feel like the game rewards nasty behaviour the same as good gameplay, if you tunnel (pick a single person to hook till dead, find a new player, rinse and repeat) or camp/proxy or pick perks and/or players just to piss people off (ie sloppy butcher), then you get almost the same points a person who goes for the person rescuing, not the person off hook, and doesn't camp/proxy, and picks perks that still allow for a fun gameplay. The Survivors have less of a chance to be a Dic k than killers, but that doesn't mean they can't, but I feel that the points reflect how you game more in survivor, if you don't heal, chase, or really do anything other than just do generators the whole time, you only get the objective points (and survivor, if you live), everything else will be bronze, or nothing. So, despite myself being salty over countless bad matches, and while typing realizing I have done some of these things myself, I am not saying that I am perfect, but i think honestly that there should be a better system to stop people from being trolls and gen jockies, I think that the game has tons of potential, but I wish it was just a little more friendly to play.
